text: Blangerval-Blangermont is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 25 miles (40 km) west of Arras on the D109 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Pierre, dating from the twentieth century. * The church of St. Jacques, dating from the eighteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Blangerval-Blangermont
